articles.title: Awesome Freeview TV tricks you might’ve missed that every viewer needs to master - Express
articles.description: FREEVIEW viewers might've missed some of these handy tricks. Whether you've got the free-to-watch service built into your telly, or you're watching on an Amazon Fire TV Stick, these should help with your next binge-watch.
